trends: There have been 66 other sightings in South Kingstown
There were no other sightings in South Kingstown on or around April 5th 2007
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Low, hovering, dark chevron craft with huge white light, small green light.
divs: Sighting DetailsReturning from a night class at the Univ. of Rhode Island, I approached the intersection of Post Rd. and Ministerial Rd whereupon I noticed a huge, perhaps 20 ft in diameter, yellowish white circle of light hovering above a house at the above intersection. I knew it should not be there, so I drove to the closest point under the light near Pitcher's Garage, but closer to the intersection. The light just hovered, made no sound, so I got out of my car to get a better look...I could barely make out the very dark outline of the craft, about the size of a small jet liner..I think I remember another white light at the other 'wing tip.' In the center of the craft was a small 'electric green' flashing light, a medium pretty shade of green. One car came out of a side lane next to me but quickly sped off..I don't know if they saw the craft and paniced or what, but they drove off in a hurry. I stayed and watched the craft. No other people were on the street. As I observed the craft I had a feeling of time slowing down right where I was...an odd feeling. Otherwise, nothing unusual. The craft then slowly pivoted, very smoothly, and drifted north on Ministerial Rd and perhaps to the east a bit, over the treeline, where I lost sight of it. I then called the South Kingstown police to report it. The dispatcher, a woman, took my call seriously but reported no one else reporting this object. I gave her a description of the craft. I then drove the two miles home in amazement of what I saw. There was no missing time or other phenomenom.
